Class FireObstacle

java.lang.Object
  Obstacle
      FireObstacle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
public class FireObstacle
extends Obstacle

A FireObstacle is an Obstacle that does not take damage but instead deals damage to all opponents that walk through. It dies when it has done a certain amount of damage.

Author:
Ayush Mehra, Vincent Yang

Parameters:
player - The player who owns the FireObstacle

animatedObstacleImages - the set of images that represent the FireObstacle
